summary: Two tribal cops uncover a plot involving a lost fortune, an historical artifact and a mythical Coyote on a Navajo reservation.
cast: Adam Beach|Candice Costello|Jimmy Herman|Gary Kanin|Wes Studi|Sheila Tousey|Mark Kilburn|Alex Rice|Graham Greene|Jill Scott Momaday|Keith Carradine|Sheri Foster|Jack Burning|Long Nguyen|Paul Guilfoyle|Jenni Blong|Marc Mouchet|Bodhi Elfman|Gary Farmer|Kevin Skousen|Joseph Tran|Cami Leonard|Rick Wiles|Christopher Ahmie|Tom Briggs|Fred Lopez|Anthony Parker|Louis C. Simon|Rosemary Thomas|Dyron C. Thompson
title: Coyote Waits
